00037  SUBROUTINE MemAlloc(FLAG)
00038 
00039 ! Common Variables
00040  USE Domain,      ONLY : ni, ni_f, xmax, xmax_f, xmin, xmin_f, ymax, ymax_f, ymin, ymin_f
00041  USE FluidParams, ONLY : gradPhiX_f, gradPhiY_f, lapPhi_f, p, p_f, phi_f, u, u_f
00042  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : f, fcol, fdim, g, gdim
00043  IMPLICIT NONE
00044 
00045 ! Input/Output Parameters
00046  INTEGER, INTENT (IN) :: FLAG
00047 
00048  IF(FLAG == 1) THEN
00049 
00050 ! Hydrodynamics and neighbor arrays - Momentum/Pressure mesh
00051  ALLOCATE(   p(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax) )
00052  ALLOCATE(   u(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax,2) )
00053  ALLOCATE(  ni(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax,1:4) )
00054 
00055 ! Hydrodynamics and neighbor arrays - Order parameter mesh
00056  ALLOCATE(   p_f(xmin_f:xmax_f,ymin_f:ymax_f) )
00057  ALLOCATE(   u_f(xmin_f:xmax_f,ymin_f:ymax_f,2) )
00058  ALLOCATE( phi_f(xmin_f:xmax_f,ymin_f:ymax_f) )
00059  ALLOCATE(  ni_f(xmin_f:xmax_f,ymin_f:ymax_f,1:4) )
00060 
00061 ! Differential term arrays - Order parameter mesh
00062  ALLOCATE( gradPhiX_f(xmin_f:xmax_f,ymin_f:ymax_f) )
00063  ALLOCATE( gradPhiY_f(xmin_f:xmax_f,ymin_f:ymax_f) )
00064  ALLOCATE(   lapPhi_f(xmin_f:xmax_f,ymin_f:ymax_f) )
00065 
00066 ! Memory allocation for distribution functions
00067  ALLOCATE(    f(xmin_f:xmax_f,ymin_f:ymax_f,0:fdim) )
00068  ALLOCATE( fcol(xmin_f:xmax_f,ymin_f:ymax_f,0:fdim) )
00069  ALLOCATE(    g(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax,0:gdim,0:1) )
00070 
00071  ELSE
00072 
00073 ! Free momentum/pressure mesh arrays
00074  DEALLOCATE( p )
00075  DEALLOCATE( u )
00076  DEALLOCATE( ni )
00077  DEALLOCATE( g )
00078 
00079 ! Free order parameter mesh arrays
00080  DEALLOCATE( f )
00081  DEALLOCATE( fcol )
00082  DEALLOCATE( ni_f )
00083  DEALLOCATE( phi_f )
00084  DEALLOCATE( p_f )
00085  DEALLOCATE( u_f )
00086  DEALLOCATE( gradPhiX_f )
00087  DEALLOCATE( gradPhiY_f )
00088  DEALLOCATE( lapPhi_f )
00089 
00090  END IF
00091 
00092  RETURN
00093  END SUBROUTINE MemAlloc
00094
